articles.description: ESPN FC’s Alejandro Pareja-Rodriguez is joined by Shaka Hislop to discuss Chelsea’s preseason struggles. Shaka is concerned by Chelsea’s lack of transfer act...

articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: EA is bringing back Juventus for FIFA 23 - The Verge
articles.description: EA Sports has announced that Italian club Juventus will be featured in FIFA 23 after previously being exclusive to Konami’s Pro Evolution Soccer.
articles.content: The multi-year deal will also run through the next non-FIFA game
